changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.subtitle: Discover all the new features and improvements brought to Upstra

team.title: The team behind Upstra
team.subtitle: Passionate developers building the future of infrastructure management
team.quote: Building tools that simplify complexity is our passion.

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Layout
deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.

resource-usage.name: Resource Usage
resource-usage.description: CPU, memory, storage and network usage

setup.title: Getting Started with Upstra
setup.welcome_desc: Congratulations, you are the first administrator of this installation. We will configure your infrastructure step by step!
setup.step_rooms_desc: Define your physical spaces and their capacity
setup.step_ups_desc: Manage power protection for your equipment
setup.step_servers_desc: Monitor your physical and virtual servers
setup.info: This setup takes about 5 minutes. You will be able to change these settings later.
setup.skip_confirm: Are you sure you want to skip guided setup?
setup.next_step_aria: Go to next step: create a server room
setup.feature_rooms_desc: Create and manage your server rooms, data centers, and physical locations for optimal organization.
setup.feature_servers_desc: Monitor and control your physical and virtual servers with real-time status updates and SSH access.
setup.feature_ups_desc: Ensure continuous operation with UPS monitoring, battery status tracking, and automated shutdown procedures.
setup.feature_security_desc: Protect your infrastructure with role-based access control, two-factor authentication, and audit logging.
setup.read_only_message: This step is completed. You cannot modify these settings.

rooms.subtitle: Manage your infrastructure rooms and datacenter spaces
rooms.get_started_message: Get started by creating your first room space

detail.no_servers_assigned: This room doesn't have any servers assigned yet.
detail.no_ups_assigned: This room doesn't have any UPS devices assigned yet.

rooms.create_description: Create a new room to organize and manage your server infrastructure by physical location
rooms.name: Room Name
rooms.name_hint: Enter a descriptive name to easily identify this room
rooms.location_placeholder: e.g. Building A, 2nd floor, East wing
rooms.location_hint: Describe the physical location of this room
rooms.capacity_hint: Maximum number of servers this room can accommodate
rooms.cooling_hint: Select the primary cooling method used in this room
rooms.temperature_hint: Current or target temperature in Celsius
rooms.description_hint: Optional description with additional room details
rooms.capacity_info_text: This room can accommodate up to {capacity} servers
rooms.creation_info: The room will be available for server and UPS assignments immediately after creation
rooms.capacity_invalid: Capacity must be at least 1 server

ups.search_placeholder: Search UPS by name or IP...
ups.add_first_ups: Add your first UPS to get started
ups.monitoring_placeholder: UPS monitoring data will appear here
ups.name: Name
ups.create_description: Configure your UPS device to protect your server infrastructure from power outages and fluctuations
ups.select_room: Choose the room where this UPS will be installed
ups.name_hint: Enter a unique identifier for this UPS device
ups.ip_hint: UPS network IP address in IPv4 format
ups.grace_on_hint: Time to wait before starting protected servers after power returns
ups.grace_off_hint: Time to wait before shutting down protected servers during power outage
ups.warning: Ensure the UPS capacity is sufficient to protect all critical equipment with adequate safety margin
ups.ip_invalid: Please enter a valid IP address
ups.select_room_error: Please select a room for this UPS
ups.negative_delay_error: Grace periods cannot be negative values
ups.create_modal_subtitle: Add a new UPS device to your infrastructure

servers.add_first_server: Add your first server to get started
servers.name: Name
servers.search_placeholder: Search servers by name or IP...
servers.create_description: Configure a new server to monitor and manage your infrastructure resources
servers.select_room_hint: Choose the room where this server is physically located
servers.select_ups_hint: Optionally select a UPS to protect this server
servers.name_hint: Enter a unique identifier for this server
servers.priority_hint_extended: 1-999 (1 = shuts down first, 999 = shuts down last). Critical: 1-99, High: 100-299, Medium: 300-599, Low: 600-999
servers.ip_hint: Server's primary IP address in IPv4 format
servers.grace_on_hint: Time to wait before starting the server after power returns
servers.grace_off_hint: Time to wait before forcing shutdown during power outage
servers.creation_info: The server will be added to your infrastructure and monitoring will begin automatically
servers.ip_invalid: Please enter a valid IP address
servers.select_room_error: Please select a room for this server
servers.negative_delay_error: Grace periods cannot be negative values
servers.create_modal_subtitle: Add a new server to your infrastructure

profile.delete_account_warning: This action is IRREVERSIBLE. All your data and access will be permanently removed.
profile.2fa_enabled_desc: Your account is protected by two-factor authentication
profile.2fa_disabled_desc: Enable two-factor authentication to secure your account
profile.password_desc: Change your password regularly for better security
profile.active_sessions_desc: Manage your active sessions on different devices
profile.data_export_started: Data export started. You will receive an email when it's ready.

settings_extra.subtitle: Customize your Upstra experience to your preferences
settings_extra.theme_desc: Choose between light and dark mode
settings_extra.compact_mode_desc: Reduce spacing to display more information

users.no_roles_assigned: No roles assigned to this user

roles.management_description: Manage user roles and permissions across your infrastructure
roles.get_started_assigning: Get started by assigning users to this role.
roles.select_role_hint: Choose a role from the left panel to view and manage its users and permissions.
roles.assign_users_desc: Select users to assign to this role. Users will inherit all permissions associated with this role.
roles.multi_role_info: Users can now have multiple roles and accumulate their permissions.
roles.delete_role_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the role "{role}"? This action cannot be undone.
roles.delete_role_warning: This role is currently assigned to {count} {userLabel}. Deleting this role will remove all associated permissions from these users.
roles.new_role_details: Enter the details for the new role.
roles.role_name_min: Role name must be at least 2 characters

errors.bulk_assign_fail: Failed to assign {failed} out of {total} users

validation.min_length: Role name must be at least 2 characters long
validation.max_length: Role name must not exceed 50 characters
validation.duplicate: A role with this name already exists

roles.guest_role_info: GUEST is the default role. Users with only this role cannot be removed from it as it serves as the fallback role.
roles.admin_role_info: ADMIN is a system role with full permissions. It cannot be deleted to ensure system security.

login.title: Welcome to Upstra
login.description: Log in to access your management area

register.admin_description: Set up the first administrator for your infrastructure
register.title: Create an account

messages.recovery_noted: I have written down the codes
messages.recovery_codes_desc: Keep them safe. They let you access your account if you lose access to your 2FA app.

enable2fa.title: Enable two-factor authentication
enable2fa.already_enabled: ⚠️ 2FA is already enabled for your account.
enable2fa.scan_instruction: Scan this code with your 2FA app (Google Authenticator, Authy…)
enable2fa.manual_hint: If you can't scan the QR code, enter this key manually.

twofa.title: 2FA Verification
twofa.enter_app_code: Enter the code generated by your 2FA app
twofa.switch_to_recovery: I no longer have access to my 2FA app

first_install.title: First installation detected!
first_install.desc: No administrator exists yet. The first registered user will automatically become an administrator.

notfound.message: Oops! The page you’re looking for can’t be found. It may have been moved or no longer exists.

setup_room.title: Create your first room
setup_room.description:
A room represents the physical space hosting your servers.
You can add more later.
setup_room.name_hint: Choose a descriptive name to easily identify this room
setup_room.location_hint: Describe where this room is located
setup_room.default_info: This room will be your default room. You can create more rooms from the dashboard once setup is complete.

setup_ups.title: Add a UPS
setup_ups.description: The UPS protects your servers against power outages and fluctuations.
setup_ups.select_room: Select the room where this UPS will be installed
setup_ups.grace_on_hint: Time before shutdown when power outage
setup_ups.warning: Ensure the UPS capacity is enough to protect all critical equipment with a safety margin.

setup_server.title: Add your server
setup_server.description: Configure a server to start monitoring your infrastructure.
setup_server.select_room_hint: Select the room where this server is located
setup_server.select_ups_hint: Select the UPS protecting this server
setup_server.same_login_warning: Warning: using the same login for OS and ILO is not recommended.
setup_server.same_password_warning: Warning: using the same password for OS and ILO is not recommended.
setup_server.os_access_note: Credentials different from the ILO/IPMI ones.
setup_server.ilo_access_note: Dedicated credentials, separate from OS access.
setup_server.os_section_hint: Credentials must be different from ILO/IPMI.
setup_server.ilo_section_hint: Dedicated credentials, different from OS access.
setup_server.ilo_name_hint: Used to identify this interface in the ILO list.
setup_server.reference_info: This server will be your reference server. You can add more servers and groups from the dashboard.
setup_server.info_reference: This server will be your reference server. You can add other servers and create groups from the dashboard.
setup_server.read_only_message: This data has been saved and cannot be modified. Click Next to continue.

setup_complete.title: Setup complete!
setup_complete.description: Your infrastructure is now ready. You can start using Upstra.
setup_complete.fetch_error: Some information could not be retrieved from the server.
setup_complete.invite_team_text: Add other administrators to manage the infrastructure
setup_complete.add_equipment_text: Create more rooms, UPS and servers
setup_complete.monitor_resources_text: Track your servers status in real time
setup_complete.already_done: This step was already completed, you will be redirected.
setup_complete.unexpected_error: Unexpected error while validating the step.
setup_complete.read_only_message: Setup has been completed. You cannot modify this step.

vm_discovery.no_vm: No virtual machine found on this host.
vm_discovery.ensure_online: Ensure the host is online and discovery services are active
vm_discovery.no_server_error: No server found. Please create a server first.

groups.groupShutdownDescription: Preview and execute controlled shutdown sequences for server and VM groups
groups.shutdownWarning: This will shut down the selected groups in priority order. VMs will be shut down before servers.

groups.shutdownConfirmationText: This action will shut down servers and VMs. Ensure all services are prepared for shutdown.
